title: Generative AI-Integrated Foreign Language Speaking Proficiency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level English communication skills and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Conducted in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technological Environments, with Most Learners Being Job-Seekers

learning_goals: Learners can enhance their ability to perform natural English conversations for 5 minutes through generative AI role-play simulations.
Learners can apply communication strategies in various job-related situations (e.g., interviews/presentations) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can improve speaking confidence and intrinsic motivation by over 30% in self-assessments after AI interactions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
